summary: A Jewish doctor in Nazi occupied Czech Republic (then Bohemia and Moravia) risks his life and attempts to regain his identity by assisting a wounded political fugitive.
cast: Miroslav Machácek|Olga Scheinpflugová|Zdenka Procházková|Jirí Adamíra|Josef Vinklár|Ilja Prachar|Jana Pracharová|Jirí Vrstála|Tomás Hádl|Eva Svobodová|Jirí Pleskot|Milan Mach|Mirko Musil|Roman Hemala|Slávka Budínová|Cestmír Randa|Karel Novacek|Alexandra Myskova|Iva Janzurová|Jana Brezková|Helena Ruzicková|Ruzena Preislerová|Ivo Gubel|Jirí Ostermann|Anny Freyová|Stepanka Cittová|Frantisek Chocholaty|Ota Sattler|Lída Matousková|Arnost Vrana|Zdenek Hodr|Zdenek Jiricný|Frantisek Sadilek|Bohuslav Dodek|Eva Horánková|Helena Pejsková|Ladislav Potmesil|Karel Smid|Fred Vroom
keywords: protectorate bohmen und mahren|nazi occupation|central europe|literature on screen|czech literature on screen
title: ...a pátý jezdec je Strach
